entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
